descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...four yellow squares and other blocks of colored squares.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is just as large as the design of the colored squares.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...move yellow blocks to the outer corners. Keep the colors between the yellow blocks as is. Connect the other blocks of color to their matching color in the order they appear left to right.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... two vertical line shapes with yellow squares at the top and bottom, and two other shapes that join together with colors that match the middle part of the vertical line shapes.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... the height is the same as the height of the vertical line shapes. The width is the same width as the grid between the vertical line shapes plus the two yellow squares.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... First, create a black grid according to the output grid size. Next, draw the vertical line shapes on the output grid identical to those on the input grid, and the space between the shapes should be the same too. Then, draw the other two shapes that join together in the middle of the grid, making sure that their colors match the colors of the middle part of the vertical line shapes. If the original color arrangement of the other shapes do not match the vertical line shapes, you need to flip the other shapes and draw them mirroring the original pattern so they match the color of the vertical line shapes.Note that the other two join shapes have to be drawn in the middle of the grid and nothing should be drawn on the grid where the yellow squares are.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a black grid with colored blocks.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should be the same size as the colored blocks with the yellow on the on the end and the black blocks between them.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...rotate the blocks without the yellow so they fit between the blocks with the yellow on the end and the colors match up. All colors should fit within the two sets of blocks with the yellow on the end without a need to go beyond the yellow blocks.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...three patterns of squares.  Two are vertical and two are horizontal. The vertical shapes are yellow on each end, with two squares of red or blue in the middle. The horizontal patterns are red and blue and  overlap each other on two separate lines.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...place the vertical squares on each side of the grid and the horizontal lines in the middle.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a black grid with colored blocks
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same size as the colored blocks
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...fit within the two sets of blocks

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...two vertical lines with yellow blocks in each corner
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should place one yellow block in each corner of the grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...match the colors on the pattern into the space between the two vertical lines. Some you can just pull into the middle, some you need to flip around so the colors match the side. The blocks between the yellow blocks at the top and bottom should be black.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...some colored box
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...only considered the pillar like box
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add the correct color between the pillar like box

annotated_phrases.phrase: two vertical line shapes with yellow squares at the top and bottom, and two other shapes that join together with colors that match the middle part of the vertical line shapes.
the height is the same as the height of the vertical line shapes.
The width is the same width as the grid between the vertical line shapes plus the two yellow squares.
First, create a black grid according to the output grid size.
Next, draw the vertical line shapes on the output grid identical to those on the input grid, and the space between the shapes should be the same too.
Then, draw the other two shapes that join together in the middle of the grid, making sure that their colors match the colors of the middle part of the vertical line shapes.

If the original color arrangement of the other shapes do not match the vertical line shapes, you need to flip the other shapes and draw them mirroring the original pattern so they match the color of the vertical line shapes.
Note that the other two join shapes have to be drawn in the middle of the grid and nothing should be drawn on the grid where the yellow squares are.
